body_html:
following advice from achalshah20 comment....I downloaded the nvida file.
sudo dpkg -i cuda-repo-ubuntu1604_9.0.176-1_amd64.deb
sudo apt-get install cuda-9.0

note: its important specify 9.0 if you just put cuda down then you will not get the 9.0 release if anything greater is installed.

body:
following advice from achalshah20  comment....I downloaded the nvida file.
sudo dpkg -i cuda-repo-ubuntu1604_9.0.176-1_amd64.deb
sudo apt-get install cuda-9.0

note: its important specify 9.0 if you just put cuda down then you will not get the 9.0 release if anything greater is installed.
